author: Ed Kilgore
title: Iowa’s Republican Governor Disrespects Dr. Fauci
description: As a rare governor refusing to issue a statewide stay-at-home order, Kim Reynolds errs in matching her credibility against Trump’s advisor.
content: Donald Trumps characteristic (and characteristically unreflective) 180-degree turn last weekend on the need for much more rigorous quarantining to step the coronavirus pandemic stimulated a number of Republican governors to get off the dime and issue the stat… [+2245 chars]
